snippet: One person was killed and eight people were injured in a chemical plant explosion in Donaldsonville, La., on Friday night, the state police said.
abstract: One person is killed and five injured in chemical plant explosion in Donaldsonville, La, one day after another fatal explosion at chemical plant in neighboring town of Geismar; two explosions do not appear related.
lead_paragraph: One person was killed and eight people were injured in a chemical plant explosion in Donaldsonville, La., on Friday night, the state police said.

headline.main: Louisiana: One Killed and Five Hurt In Second Chemical Plant Blast
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: One Killed and Five Hurt In Second Chemical Plant Blast
